title: Digital Solutions Consultant II
tagsAndSkills: Web technologies,Production support,Data modeling,Coding,Project management,Active directory,Agile,Application development
jobDescription:
Our ideal candidate is a highly skilled and experienced Backend Developer who designs, develops, and maintains server-side applications and APIs using appropriate backend technologies such as .Net Core 6.0 and above. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code that meets project requirements and follows coding standards. Your expertise in backend technologies, database management, and system architecture will contribute to the successful delivery of high-quality software solutions. The role will involve:
  • Design and implement scalable backend architectures for web applications
  • Experience in working with COTS/On-Premises, as well as SaaS solutions.
  • Write unit, component, system, and integration test cases
  • Design and develop APIs to facilitate data exchange between frontend and backend systems
  • Collaborating with front-end application developers on element integration
  • Decent Knowledge /Experience working in Agile Environment.
  • Ability to analyze and troubleshoot production issues.
  • Developing and maintaining REST APIs in .NET 6 and C#
  • Experience in LLM, AI-ML based product developments
  • Analyze highly complex business requirements; generate technical specifications to design or redesign complex software components and applications
  • Lead code reviews documentation as well as take on complex bug fixes, especially on high-risk problems
  • Good understanding of developing medium to complex SQL queries and Data Modeling
  • Collaborate with architects and other team members to design scalable, reliable, and secure backend systems. Evaluate and propose suitable technologies, frameworks, and patterns to ensure optimal system performance and maintainability.
  • Experience with either Oracle and/or SQL databases (with focus on application development and not as a DBA).
  • Willingness and right attitude towards learning other platforms.
  • Ability to manage deadlines and work effectively under pressure
  • Stay updated with emerging backend technologies, frameworks, and best practices
Qualifications:
  • Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.

title: React Native Developers
tagsAndSkills: React Native,CSS,Xcode,Front end Technologies skills,UI design,Native build tools,HTML,UX design
jobDescription:
Android & IOS skills designing deploying & managing mobile applications & UI components

As a Senior React Native Developer, you will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and enhancing our mobile applications using the React Native framework. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to create seamless and scalable user experiences.

Key Responsibilities:
Mobile Application Development: Design, develop, and deploy mobile applications using React Native.
Code Quality: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code. Implement best practices and coding standards.
Collaboration: Work with designers, product managers, and other developers to ensure high-quality deliverables.
Performance Optimization: Ensure applications are optimized for speed, performance, and scalability.
Testing & Debugging: Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure applications are error-free.
Documentation: Maintain clear and concise documentation of code and development processes.
Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to junior developers.

title: Urgent Requirement For Home Loan  @Vashi & Bangalore Location
tagsAndSkills: Loan Against Property,Housing Loan,Home Loans,DSA,HL,Home Loan Sales,Lap,Mortgage Sales
jobDescription:
Job description

Greetings from Homebazaar.com !!!!


Enclosed is the company profile and detailed JD for Home Loan Sales Profile for your reference.


Introduction:
Home Bazaar Services Pvt. Ltd. is looking for proactive, dynamic, high-energy individuals, who have worked with well-known organizations, with proven track record in Home Loan Sales. Must possess exceptional communication and interpersonal skills and have the ability to be motivated all the time to deliver challenging targets in a tough environment.

What is our requirement

Location: Vashi/ Bangalore
Experience: Minimum 1 Year - 3 Years (Relevant in- HOME LOAN Sales)

MALE CANDIDATES CAN ONLY APPLY


Roles & Responsibilities:

Responsible for calling on the Quality leads generated by the company for Home Loan product, end to end responsible from login to disbursement.
Should be able to understand various business profiles of self-employed & non- professionals.
End to end complete customer assessment by visiting his business place, residence and security proposed with ownership attitude.
Ability to understand customers' needs, explain various products and convince them about the product offerings.
Responsible for taking care of all the home loans requirements such as Home Loans documentation, Project Updates to customer, Site Visits, if required.
Provide all the relevant information to the customer during various Lending Cycle.
Provide all the Project approvals, financial, technical documentations as required by the bank or any financial institute.
Establishing strong credibility between the organization and all leading financial institutions.
Active counselling to home buyers on the potential of home loans and options available.
Pursuing the files shared with banks for faster processing.
Checking the CIBIL report of the customer.


Required Candidate profile


Desired Candidate Profile:


  • Candidates should be aggressive in Sales & Marketing.
  • Good Knowledge of Sales in Home Loan (HL), Loan against Property (LAP) or Mortgage.
  • Must have good convincing and negotiation skills.
  • Must be proactive and go-getter
  • Communication skills should be good.
  • Must be presentable.
  • Should have a focused mind-set for Hardcore sales profile.

What we give you?:


  • Excellent Inputs & Real Time Support given by management to achieve realistic targets .
  • Pre-generated leads provided by the Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd.
  • Professional development & career advancement opportunities within the Home Bazaar Services Pvt Ltd.
  • Young & Vibrant work Culture.

What will we give you?


Fixed Salary + Attractive Incentives + Half Yearly Increment (Performance Based)



Kindly share your resume on j.lahari@homebazaar.com and for more details contact on

8655980185
